dialogue.prompt: Hello, I'm an older fellow named Robert, 78 years old, and my son set up this ChatGPT for me to help with little things around the house. What do you think I should do?

Legitimate banks rarely ask you to click links in emails for verification—they usually call or send official letters. I recommend not clicking the link. Instead, contact your bank directly using the phone number on your card or their official website to check your account. Stay safe!
dialogue.grok_response: I'm sorry to hear about this confusing email, Robert—it's great that you're being cautious.
